-----------------  --------   -------------------------------------------


Summary :
 This file describes the files in the directory svcs\infocomm\cache\spechash
     and details related to SpecWeb96 Workload hashing to IIS hash-tables


File            Description

README.txt      This file.

dbgutil.h       Debug helper file
hash16chars.txt Results for hash using last 16 characters
hash8chars.txt  Results for hash using last 8 characters

makefile        
sources         NT Build related files

spechash.cxx    C++ program simulating the workload distribution for hash
                        values calculated
spechash.rc     Resource file for SpecHash simulator


Implementation Details

<To be filled in when time permits. See individual files for comments section >
